mapper.select: SELECT auction_info.item_code, auction_info.bid_code, cntSeed, mem_id, sub_category_code, product_name, model_name, auct_period, buynow_price, start_price, photo_name FROM sale_item, (SELECT item_code, MAX(photo_name) photo_name FROM item_photo GROUP BY item_code) item_photo,(SELECT bid_code, count(bidders_id) cntSeed FROM seed GROUP BY bid_code) seed, auction_info WHERE status = '시드참여중' AND SALE_ITEM.ITEM_CODE = ITEM_PHOTO.ITEM_CODE AND ITEM_PHOTO.ITEM_CODE = auction_info.item_code AND AUCTION_INFO.END_SEED < TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD/HH24/MI/SS') AND AUCTION_INFO.BID_CODE = SEED.BID_CODE(+)

SELECT mem_id, status, start_price, auct_progress.bid_code, auct_startdate||'~'||auct_enddate auction_period, a.end_price, bidder_id FROM sale_item, auct_progress, auction_info, (SELECT bid_code, MAX(final_price) end_price FROM bid_log GROUP BY bid_code)a ,(SELECT bidder_id, MAX(final_price) end_price FROM bid_log GROUP BY bidder_id)b WHERE status = '경매진행중' AND sale_item.item_code = auction_info.item_code AND auction_info.bid_code = auct_progress.bid_code AND auct_enddate < TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD/HH24/MI/SS') AND auct_progress.bid_code = a.bid_code(+) AND a.end_price = b.end_price(+)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AUCT_PROGRESS (bid_code, auct_startdate, auct_enddate) VALUES (#{bid_code}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD/HH24/MI/SS'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE+#{auct_period}/24,'YYYY/MM/DD/HH24/MI/SS'))
mapper.update: UPDATE SALE_ITEM SET status = '경매진행중' WHERE item_code = #{item_code}
